languages.text: {n}Арджента устало опускает голову.{/n} "Нам нужно будет поговорить... но позже. Давайте встретимся на корабле, когда придет время отбыть с Футфола".

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента устало опускает голову.{/n} "Нам нужно будет поговорить... но позже. Давайте встретимся на корабле, когда придет время отбыть с Футфола".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta lowers her head wearily.{/n} "We need to talk... but it can wait. Let's meet on the ship when it's time to depart Footfall."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента устало опускает голову.{/n} "Нам нужно будет поговорить... но позже. Давайте встретимся на корабле, когда придет время отбыть с Футфола".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta lowers her head wearily.{/n} "We need to talk... but it can wait. Let's meet on the ship when it's time to depart from Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta lowers her head wearily.{/n} "We need to talk... but it can wait. Let's meet on the ship when it's time to depart from Footfall."

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔疲惫地低下了头。{/n}“咱们可以谈谈……不过这件事可以先放一放。等咱们准备离开落脚港的时候，再在船上好好谈谈吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her head wearily.{/n} "We need to talk... but it can wait. Let's meet on the ship when it's time to depart Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔疲惫地低下了头。{/n}“咱们可以谈谈……不过这件事可以先放一放。等咱们准备离开落脚港的时候，再在船上好好谈谈吧。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta agacha la cabeza, cansada.{/n} «Tenemos que hablar... pero no aquí. Hablemos en la nave cuando sea el momento de partir de Paso».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her head wearily.{/n} "We need to talk... but it can wait. Let's meet on the ship when it's time to depart Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta agacha la cabeza, cansada.{/n} «Tenemos que hablar... pero no aquí. Hablemos en la nave cuando sea el momento de partir de Paso».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは疲れたように頭を下げた。{/n}「話があります…ですが、後回しでかまいません。フットフォールを出発する時間になったら、船で会おう」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her head wearily.{/n} "We need to talk... but it can wait. Let's meet on the ship when it's time to depart Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは疲れたように頭を下げた。{/n}「話があります…ですが、後回しでかまいません。フットフォールを出発する時間になったら、船で会おう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta senkt müde den Kopf.{/n} "Wir müssen reden ... aber das kann warten. Wir sollten uns auf dem Schiff treffen, bevor wir Footfall verlassen."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her head wearily.{/n} "We need to talk... but it can wait. Let's meet on the ship when it's time to depart Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta senkt müde den Kopf.{/n} "Wir müssen reden ... aber das kann warten. Wir sollten uns auf dem Schiff treffen, bevor wir Footfall verlassen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta baisse la tête avec lassitude.{/n} « J'ai aussi quelque chose à vous dire... mais cela peut attendre. Retrouvons-nous à bord du vaisseau lorsqu'il sera temps de quitter Castel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her head wearily.{/n} "We need to talk... but it can wait. Let's meet on the ship when it's time to depart Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta baisse la tête avec lassitude.{/n} « J'ai aussi quelque chose à vous dire... mais cela peut attendre. Retrouvons-nous à bord du vaisseau lorsqu'il sera temps de quitter Castel. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, yılgınlıkla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Konuşmamız lazım... Fakat bekleyebilir. Binliman'dan ayrılma zamanımız geldiğinde gemide buluşalım."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her head wearily.{/n} "We need to talk... but it can wait. Let's meet on the ship when it's time to depart Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, yılgınlıkla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Konuşmamız lazım… Ancak biraz daha beklemekten zarar gelmez. Binliman'dan ayrılma zamanımız geldiğinde gemide buluşalım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
